ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="74496-1" Injury location ICD code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5 NEMSISCodeSystem) (CONF:11202)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:11203)
See NEMSIS recommended subset at http://nemsis.org/v3/resources.html. ICD-10 CM contains "place of occurrence of external cause" under code Y92.
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode with data type x_ActMoodDocumentObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="74496-1" Injury location ICD code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5 NEMSISCodeSystem) (CONF:11202)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:11203)
See NEMSIS recommended subset at http://nemsis.org/v3/resources.html. ICD-10 CM contains "place of occurrence of external cause" under code Y92.
